title: MRS. FONSEKA HAS NO DESIRE TO SEE FONSEKA FREED, SAYS KEHELIYA RAMBUKWELLA
content: October 07, 2010: Sarath Fonseka’s family members are not interested in securing his release, says the Minister of Mass Media and Communication Keheliya Rambukwella. The Minister made this statement while addressing the cabinet media briefing today. “When Vijaya Kumarathunga was imprisoned on naxerlite charges, Chandrika Kumarathunga met the President on several occasions and requested for…
